attributes.action: Force David Cameron to step down as Prime Minister following the EU Leave vote.
attributes.background:
Prime Minister David Cameron has lied and misled the British public for years, however for the last few weeks he has gone in to overdrive while campaigning for a 'remain' vote. Thankfully the country saw through the lies and voted 'out'
The man can no longer be trusted.
He needs to go TODAY.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
